website_summaries.verdict: A spacious, rugged backpack that has ample space for organizing your items, from school supplies to hiking gear.
pros: Built to carry plenty of gear, thanks to the 31-liter design with a 15-inch fleece-lined laptop sleeve and front stash pocket
Hydration port provides easy access to water bottles, a handy feature for long hikes
cons: The straps have a tendency to be somewhat scratchy and irritating
Pack is a bit on the heavy side

customer_reviews.title: Great Carry-On
customer_reviews.text: This is my grad school BFF. It holds soooo much stuff. We are frequent flyers from CLE to ATL and this is a great item to avoid the costs of a carry-on item. It fits nicely under the seat and allows for easy times through TSA. When used as a backpack, this item really manages the weight nicely, I love the padded straps and the additional supports through the rear of the item. It has more than adequate storage and helps me stay or organized though the day. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in LOVE with this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in LOVE with this backpack! My last backpack was the Amazon Basics Laptop Backpack and it seemed so heavy for the amount of things I carried but when I switched to this one, what a significant difference! The backpack is lightweight on my shoulders which is probably due to the molded shoulder pads. The flexvent back panel is much more comforting on your back/spine than a traditional flat back support as well. Lastly, the side mesh pockets for water bottles can actually fit a 32 oz container!
customer_reviews.author: pepavone

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I am in the military and needed an all black bag, and my options were limited. I love that it's woman specific. I ordered both this and the borealis, and kept this one. It has more space and the front mesh pocket is more usable than the bungees on the front of the borealis. I love all the pockets in front to keep my stuff organized, since I carry this instead of a purse. I do wish the big pocket had more width so I could fit my lunch in there better. All in all a great bag, and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great space and design.
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a bag that has a place for everything and then room for more. This bag is perfect when toting laptops, tablets, chargers, sunglasses, phones. The crush-proof compartment is a bonus and the side pockets are stretchable and deep enough for large water bottles. I am a small frame (about 5'2") and don't feel like the bag overpowers me (too much). I would LOVE this bag in a slightly smaller version, but still this is highly recommended. It looks more professional that many backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: J.E.S.

customer_reviews.title: Best back pack I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best back pack I have ever bought! Soooooo worth the price. I have back issues and it hurts me to carry a normal back pack so I bought a roll around backpack and got tired of picking it up and down and loading it into my car, so I bought this hoping for the best. Long story short this backpack is a do it all! It has thick padding on the back as well as shoulder straps that are padded carrying alot of weight off my back. Theres also padded inside pockets for your computer! It has chest straps also making it feel like you're almost carrying nothing. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality.
customer_reviews.text: My daugher absolutely loved this backpack. Very roomy with plenty of pockets for pens, pencils, and extra necessities. Love the side pockets for storing her Swell bottle because this style has a higher netting on the side pocket which helps keep your drink secure. And she carries her lunch box hooked to the side of the backpack. Nice interior padding also for her laptop. The quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Well made bag but a bit heavy and stiff.  I couldn't wear bag long before it became a burden
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the bag is high, constructed well and not easily destructible. Pocket space is ample in this bag and the colors are attractive. The bag has a stiff backing and angle so that the bag must fall forward and not backwards to protect a laptop however this feature is also a negative for me since the bag is constantly face done picking up surface dirt and grime. The stiff backing and high quality construction are a pro and con as well considering it became heavy to carry causing back discomfort. The shoulder straps were comfortable and made with women in mind. Love the bag but not my go to bag to carry due to these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: SCM

customer_reviews.title: Great pack for all your needs...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pack to replace my swiss pack that has been through a lot of abuse. After a long business trip out of the country this pack served me beautifully. It's much lighter than my swiss pack and has plenty of pockets for storage. The only thing i could mention thats a minus is that the laptop compartment is tight for a 15 inch laptop. Maybe it should be tight because it holds the computer like a glove. If you have a bigger laptop you will need a bigger pack. I highly recommend this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe-O

customer_reviews.title: Heavier and stiffer than I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: Gonna be honest... I thought I'd love this bag, but it's really stiff, the zipper is tricky to open, and I can't really pack that much into it - which is weird because it looks so big. Ultimately, it's heavy, especially when I add my laptop and charger, planner, etc. I love the color though! And it does a good job of protecting my laptop (which is probably part of why it's so stiff). Still hoping that it grows on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and attractive bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack- it looks great, holds up well, and pretty comfortably carries whatever you could need for school (or work I imagine). Pros: High quality material, looks noticeable but subtle, easily holds my laptop (15" Razer Blade), lots of pockets for carrying work out items (bars, drinks, etc). Cons: While initially was very comfortable, has been hard to get the fit right lately- probably just an issue with me. But did seem to do better with lots of weight over the lighter load I'm carrying this semester.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nic Dodson

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this backpack. Before this one, I had a backpack that was way too big for my body. The fact that this one doesn't open too wide is exactly what I needed and it is so durable! It is perfect for my Air Force uniform regulations, holds lots of things, and is just overall handy! 10/10 would recommend to anyone who currently has a backpack that isn't working for them, this one is the one!I also love the pocket in the very front. Very handy to put my student ID and headphones in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack I have ever put on my shoulders..
customer_reviews.text: Damn. I thought I loved my previous Recon backpack, but words cannot describe how much I love this thing. Glad I went with the dark grey & lime green bag. Pictures do not do this bag justice. Please just stop using the one you have now and order this one. You will not regret it. Best north face on the market. Cannot wait to be slugging this baby around at Disney this year! Con: it is definitely on the heavy side of a bag, so if you like those bags that weigh the same as a piece of paper this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: gabe

customer_reviews.title: and a book comfortably for commuting
customer_reviews.text: I did NOT receive the color I ordered; I was sent an unattractive, washed-out, indeterminate color (green? plain blue?) and Grey backpack. Unfortunately I needed the backpack right away, otherwise I would have returned it. It does not stand up AT ALL which is irritating. It is also smaller than what I thought it would be (even though I measured my old back pack prior to ordering to compare). It will not hold my laptop, shoes, lunch, wallet, and a book comfortably for commuting.
customer_reviews.author: K0220

customer_reviews.title: Love The North Face
customer_reviews.text: It is a North Face back pack, what else can you expect, it fits perfectly, can go all day with it on my back and you won't even fill it. I travel most of the time, and running at airports with something that isn't comfortable is a pain in the b...., these back pack has it all, good looking, comfortable, fully adjustable, waterproof, can carry my Laptop (HP ProBook), tablet (9.2") and all of my gadgets. Lots of space!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome support and lasting quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack!! I bought this when I first started college because I didn’t have a good backpack in high school and was really worried about my back hurting with a cheaper bag (I had surgery on my spine a few years ago so comfort was a big part of my decision). This backpack has performed great for my needs (I carry probably close to 10-15 lbs on my back, sometimes more) and has left my back feeling great! The support in this bag is awesome and the bag has held up so well that it still looks brand new years later. Definitely recommend spending the money on this bag, it feels like it’s going to last me forever.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Best

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't buy things like this that I can't see, touch or feel first. But, I needed a backpack for vacation (we were going on several day hikes and bus trips). Its has some padding so it was comfortable and the mesh pockets on the side held 2 full water bottles. Now I take it to work, it has plenty of pockets and is padded for keys, cellphone, computer, sunglasses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WRONG MODEL SENT
customer_reviews.text: The picture/description of this backpack was of the 2017-previous model of the women's recon backpack. The item I received was the 2018/current model of the recon - there are many design differences such as a separate computer pocket behind the backpack handle, fewer pockets in the organizational pocket, and a third pocket in the middle. I really wanted the old model because I like it better and I wish this link was accurate. I will be returning this item. If you are trying to find the old model recon, don't buy this one!!
customer_reviews.author: dmm

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Space
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this book bag because I thought that it would relieve some of the pressure from caring a heavy book bag around school. The book bag is very supportive, but it does not have a lot of compartments. I have a lot of books that did fit into the book bag, however it was very difficult to try to get the books out of the bag. If you want the book bag for storage (more compartments/space) do not buy, but if you want a book bag to relieve pressure from caring too many books and a computer then definitely buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nyia Lampkin

customer_reviews.title: So stiff. Why?!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is stiff as a board. It's so uncomfortable. Amazon's return policy is now 30 days so I couldn't return it. What a waste! Just know - if you're searching for a great backpack to help with back and shoulder pain, North face makes other backpacks that aren't stiff and will still help to achieve your goal.
customer_reviews.author: Jill K

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack but can't stand up without falling over.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this backpack for my kid! It's well made. I love all the design of this backpack. The "con" I have is the backpack will not stand upright at all. The bottom needs to have some type of rigid piece added in to allow it to sit up straight unassisted. Probably not a big deal if you're using it for hiking, but for a school backpack, that issue can be very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: TSD

customer_reviews.title: The Recon is perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new backpack for work because my fancy leather briefcase, while gorgeous was heavy, too large in crowded spaces and not as functional as I'd like on trips away for a week. The Recon is perfect for what I needed it for. Fits laptop and iPad plus all essentials in a slim form factor. I can't pack three changes of clothes in here, but all my essential equipment is easily stowed. I do still have a little room for souvenirs or small items. Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It's so durable and lightweight for a normal school bag. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it didn't look like the picture, in the picture, it looks mint with some darker green but in reality, it's just teal. still, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Durable backpack with lots of room
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! I’m a nursing student and have LOTS of heavy books... this held everything the entire semester without evidence of tearing. The two side pockets held my coffee and water bottle securely. There is a laptop sleeve that kept my laptop safe. All the pockets are convenient as well. The ONLY con is that it leans forward whether the backpack is full or empty. That’s it. Definitely worth the price and brand.
customer_reviews.author: CHELSEY SELF

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Great Looking!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months now, and I love it! My only issue is that, even after all this wear-in time, it is still really stiff and will slide down whatever it is leaning against if it is at a more flat angle on a less than rough surface. Rear laptop sleeve is really tight. I use it for holding a tool case, but I would imagine it would hold a laptop really snug
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: This is actually perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've owned North Face backpacks for the past 15 years or so. This may be one of their best designs yet. Everything about this backpack's design is functional, ranging from the laptop sleeve to the pen pockets. The lumbar support is phenomenal and is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Straps are no good
customer_reviews.text: The straps on the women's North Face backpack are extremely uncomfortable. They are super thin and don't provide any cushion at all. Otherwise the backpack is sturdy and very durable. Opt for the men's version especially if you aren't a small petite women.
customer_reviews.author: semina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! It has enough space to fit a 9.7 inch iPad in the front pocket (even with a slim case), tons of organization pockets, and two bottle holders on each side. I am so happy with the color and fit! If you're looking for a new backpack, definitely consider this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part of the backpack is the built-in whistle on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting this backpack for myself for a long time. It's very convenient when you go on hikes without putting so much stress on your back. There are many compartments to put all your stuff in whether you use it for backpacking or for school, as it has a special compartment for your laptop. My favorite part of the backpack is the built-in whistle on the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller than what I expected, but it does what I need it to do! I had a different North Face backpack for a number of years and was sad to have to purchase a new one. This one is durable and had just the right amount of pockets. The lap top compartment in the back is very nice and provide support and protection.
customer_reviews.author: amkettle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag fits my body perfectly I'm 5'4" 128lbs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag fits my body perfectly I'm 5'4" 128lbs. Helps my back. I got it to replace an old Isabella bp I wish I had replaced it sooner. This one is roomy and some what water proof. Already has gone through many rains and a snowstorm nothing go wet.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Aloe

customer_reviews.title: Great for School and other Active things
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backpack for a a little over a year and it has been perfect for both school and activities like hiking or flying. There are no issues with tearing or weak points that I've noticed from a year of rough use. I highly recommend this backpack, it won't let you down. Laptop case protects my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Superb!!! Its too comfortable to carry stuffs. Lot of space and compartments. I use it for my college. I have 13' laptop with charger, notebooks, 2 lunch boxes, at times a jacket, extra pair of clothes. It till has a lot of space. The waist and chest belt makes it very easy to carry the bag. The weight does not feel much on the shoulders. This is the best brand I have used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bidzi

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for long travel and a smaller woman's frame
customer_reviews.text: After testing out several backpacks for business trips to South Asia, I finally found one that fits my smaller frame. This backpack is perfect for my 13" macbook, folders, Kindle and all the other stuff I take for a long trip. It's pretty heavy when fully packed, but the weight feels so balanced on my body (I'm 5'3 and 114 lbs). The only improvement could be on the water bottle pouch. There's no drawstring and the water bottle slides up and out of the holder as soon as you set the backpack down. Also wish it had a couple places to hang/attach other items.
customer_reviews.author: PVal

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with the quality of a North ...
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with the quality of a North Face backpack. I bought this for my husband after his last one finally fell apart after using it everyday for ten years. It may seem pricey at the time of purchase, but these backpacks are built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand on its own
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice backpack for college students. Everything is great. The only complaint I have is that the back part of the backpack imitates the curve of your back. I mean, that’s genius for when you have it on your back. I just hate the fact that when I place it down on the ground it can’t seem to stand on its own. I have to angle it in a certain way and even then it just plops on the ground. It’s a little inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: It's not as sturdy as I thought it would be. One of the clips was ripped out when I was trying to clean it and left a hole in the largest compartment and the water bottle compartment is starting to tear. This didn't happen to my Isabella :( This backpack isn't suitable for shorter adults
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement after a mouse ate my old one. So nice to have a backpack that isn’t huge on my torso. It’s a great fit. Not even remotely water resistant but it is good in all other catergories.
customer_reviews.author: Squeaky

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The size of the compartments is perfect - holds a lot without getting too bulky. I love the fleece lined pockets and the section up front for shoving in a jacket or keys!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Delp

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Booth this for my husband to replace another north face backpack he’d had for 15 years. He loves it and took it skiing with him. Lots of different compartments to store different things. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Size aren't true but nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to allow me access laptop and books, include my clothes in one zipper. Howver this does provide but feels little too small for 28L size. I used use North Face Pivoter, and are little smaller than this, but have so much access for clothes, but little room for books with laptop. I probably will go with Pivoter.
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack Ever
customer_reviews.text: I cannot stress how much I love this backpack. It came on time and was just perfect. I got in for my teenage daughter who was entering the 9th grade, and she absolutely loves it just as much as I do. Would definitely recommend to any student or anyone looking to get a highly durable backpack.
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Best bag ever! If the size of your bag is c concern for you make sure you look at the sizing in the description. This one is a mid-sized bag. It does however have all of the bells and whistles of the large bags and is sturdy. It is a tank.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Sleeper

customer_reviews.title: One Hell of a Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic backpack. This one is replacing a previous North Face Recon that I used for over 6 years while traveling to over 60 countries. They are solid backpacks. I only wish they wouldn't have eliminated the two straps located at the bottom of the bag for things like sleeping pads or bags.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Holmes

customer_reviews.title: The actual backpack is fine, and would probably perfect for someone with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’3” and less than 110 lbs. The straps are really uncomfortable, and give me a neck/headache. The actual backpack is fine, and would probably perfect for someone with a larger frame. I’ve only used the backpack for a month, but I’ll probably have to switch to a backpack with more comfortable straps.
customer_reviews.author: Chandni

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't expect anything less from The North Face. Great quality, sturdy build. Daughter carries virtually every textbook she has in this thing and it holds up extremely well with all the weight in it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S

customer_reviews.title: She loves it...
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift for my granddaughter and she loves it...
customer_reviews.author: JD Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Students
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money, maybe even more! Received this backpack for my birthday and it's been of great use since. I can comfortably fit my laptop, a few notebooks, and a bunch of other small knickknacks (snacks, god yes, the snacks) in here without looking like a turtle. Also, it's very well-designed so that you're not hunched over when carrying it. The cushioning offers great support and, in a way, it automatically makes me straighten my back because of its design. This will also be great when I carry much more items than the aforementioned. Overall, very satisfied with this gift! Definitely recommend you purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! This backpack is perfect for carrying my things to and from school.
customer_reviews.author: Flossie Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for all
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for school and doubles as a good day hike backpack. The water bottle mesh holders are tight and secure. The chest and waist straps are fantastic and carrying is very comfortable. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Darkbull

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is perfect for traveling on a place and/or hauling your laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: North Face products are so well made. This backpack is perfect for traveling on a place and/or hauling your laptop around. The space inside is limited so I would not recommend it if you are looking for lots of space to pack things.
customer_reviews.author: Mitri Hanania

customer_reviews.title: Still like new after 3 years. Very comfortable, durable
customer_reviews.text: I wear this backpack daily and put it through a lot of abuse with heavy items and use. Has held strong after a year, still looking basically new. I had wanted to invest in a north face backpack for a long time and it has not disappointed. It's also incredibly comfortable to walk with. I carry it during my 30 minute commute, while travelling, and then some. Update: still use it daily after 3 years. Looks great. In practically like new condition. So impressed with this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Backpack review.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our daughter to use as her school backpack. It is more than suitable for her needs. Very well made and a lot of storage space for her books and notebooks. Empty, it is light, which does not add to the weight when loaded with her school supplies
customer_reviews.author: windsorsdad

customer_reviews.title: I just wanted to mention that this does indeed fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to mention that this does indeed fit a laptop that is approximately 15 x 9.75 x 1.5 inches (diagonally, this is a 17 inch laptop). It is snug, but it does indeed fit into the laptop pouch section, which leaves plenty of room in the other front section. Well-built and lightweight. Did a lot of looking before getting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Larry H.

customer_reviews.title: It has good capacity, sensible compartments
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack every day for work. It has good capacity, sensible compartments, it's light-weight, and it looks good. Perfect for every day work, school, or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Always check Amazon first
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast delivery and a quality product. I tried to order this on ebags until I was advised it was back ordered.....I should have know better and checked Amazon first.
customer_reviews.author: Theo

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: The back is super hard and awkward. The bag is heavy when empty. It's super stiff on the back and straps. I honestly don't see how people are calling it comfortable from out of the box. I think people are idealizing it just because it's a north face. I can see it maybe being more comfortable after being broken in. It falls on its face most of the time no matter how u pack it. Otherwise, it has a lot of pockets for organization and storage and will do well for the average student. It can earn a solid 4 stars if it gets more comfortable and flexible after being broke in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonia

customer_reviews.title: The back side is really stiff like there's cardboard inside
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is really heavy out of the package. The back side is really stiff like there's cardboard inside. Used this for a two week trip to Scotland and was disappointed in the comfort and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable backpack, and very roomy. It is a bit on the stiff side; hoping it will soften up over time. I did receive a different color than what I ordered, but I liked it and ended up keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this pack for my everyday work carry bag for a couple months. Plenty of room for my laptop, journal, all the cables and misc gear. The pack is very comfortable to wear when slung over one shoulder or two.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: North face quality. Does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and quality. Perfect for my college needs. Not too big for my petite body but big enough to hold my laptop, books, calculator, folders etc.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but space is limited
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's a North Face bookbag, it's going to be great.. isn't it? The only thing is, because of the amount of pockets, there isn't a lot of room in there for larger items.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: but it works fine for my 13 inch
customer_reviews.text: Got the asphalt with green, such a striking backpack and perhaps one of the coolest looking ones I've ever owned. The quality is incredible and build is very durable. I use it for my laptop, and the sleeve design is different from the older recons, but it works fine for my 13 inch. Another great TNF product.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the last backpack I'll ever need or want. Great for carrying a laptop.
customer_reviews.author: 4Hamlet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backpack, plenty of inner pockets to organise your ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and this fits a little on the large side, but it doesn't bother me much. Excellent backpack, plenty of inner pockets to organise your stuff. Love the laptop section inside. I've travelled with just this backpack over weekends, it's quite capacious.
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: He drags it everywhere and it has been great. He is a special needs student and takes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's second recon backpack. He drags it everywhere and it has been great. He is a special needs student and takes everything he uses in this backpack including his communication platform ipad, which has a nice sleeve of its own inside. If he needs another backpack in a couple of years we will certainly buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Kjell's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable, I wear this very often with a lot of stuff in it and have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: ipad sleeve
customer_reviews.text: My Ipad did not fit in the sleeve so I had to return this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Dixon

customer_reviews.title: So many little pockets
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy bag with numerous pockets and loops to hold all of you gear.
customer_reviews.author: kristiem

customer_reviews.title: Great redesign for an already amazing bag.
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this bag, and my 15" MBP started to wear a hole into it. I bought the newer one, because it said it supported up to 15". The redesign is really great. It sits flatter than the older model, and is wider to truly accommodate a 15" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and durable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and durable! Can hold a lunch bag, one laptop, a charger, four little travel bags and much more! Waterproof and rip proof, does not gather any dirt or dust!
customer_reviews.author: Swaksha

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Super Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this backpack. It has like 13 compartments, its durable, comparable, and stylish for school or the outdoors. I absolutely love it! Its pricey but well worth the money :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this backpack mainly for school and it works great - plenty of pockets for storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack mainly for school and it works great - plenty of pockets for storage, and the laptop protector is a great feature. I also have taken the backpack on several hikes and have been really satisfied with its comfort, weight and ease of packing.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Penthouse Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a 2010 North Face backpack. The upgrades are amazing, roomy, laptop section and fits everything I need for work, class and yoga. Durable and great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for every occasion!
customer_reviews.text: So much space and pockets for EVERYTHING. I love how it has padded straps so it doesnt hurt my shoulders or back when I carry all of my college books. I know you can get so many uses out of this backpack. I also used it for hiking and traveling and it was the best backpack I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Luu

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality But Heavy/Stiff
customer_reviews.text: This bag is excellent quality but surprisingly heavy even with nothing in it and very still. Found it to be too much for everyday.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to organize
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to take with her on international travels. It is roomy and easily organized. She just left today, so I don't know how it will hold up, but we have had one of these before and it was great so we expect similar mileage.
customer_reviews.author: K. Self

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice, little smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice back pack, didn’t hold as many books as expected. Had an error in the amazon website and received the wrong color twice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I asked him for an update- He said it is the perfect size- and so much more comfortable than other backpacks ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it! Sent it as a surprise before he started college this year. I asked him for an update- He said it is the perfect size- and so much more comfortable than other backpacks he has had in the past. I love it when I get it right!
customer_reviews.author: Escape

customer_reviews.title: This is great for both school and when traveling
customer_reviews.text: Computer pocket inside protects my computer well, and there's also a large pocket in the front that protects my much thinner macbook. This is great for both school and when traveling, it holds a lot. Front pocket can hold a pair of tennis shoes, and water bottle pockets on sides are big enough for nalgene bottles. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: There are tons of pockets in this backpack. The front pocket and laptop holder has nice and fuzzy material.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I like all the compartments and the spots on both sides ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for day hikes, mushroom hunting, fishing and lugging back and forth from our cabin. I like all the compartments and the spots on both sides for water bottles. Zippers are high quality. Backpack is very comfortable to wear whe hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Cameala Freed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: Awsome bag, daughter loves it. Second yr we buy one for her. Colors are outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Will come handy for my nursing program
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this backpack! This will come so handy for my nursing program ! So many pockets, plenty of space for all my books and laptop. I chose the color that will match my scrubs. The picture doesn’t give justice to it at all. Plus, I just got a bit lazy opening the bag. 🙄😆 Once this wears out after years of wear and tear, will most likely buy another one from here!! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Maegha Saraf

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my backpack since April now and so far I have no issues with it. I love this backpack and probably the only complaint I have is that people tell me I look like a turtle haha! Also, the backpack I bought was definitely authentic and I am happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased this before for my daughter now for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this before for my daughter now for my son is till being used by my daughter all through high school then college and now beyond !!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: SO happy with this backpack! It came very fast in the mail and I was not very expensive! Compartments are deep and definitely able to fit a lot of stuff! I highly recommend this backpack to anyone looking for a backpack for the new school year!
customer_reviews.author: Kyia S.

customer_reviews.title: not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: was going to return this backpack because was not the one I wanted. I​ kept it been like a month and the straps have broken do not buy this backpack!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wear it everyday!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this packpak almost everyday. I saw some of reviews saying old one is better. Well, I don't knowhow good is old one but this one just good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jiyoung K. Lacasse

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Only marked it down because it was supposed to be all black. The one that shipped had grey strap ends. Still looks good, just not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Adam F.

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack! Well made with just the right amount ...
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Well made with just the right amount of storage areas. Fits well for someone that is 5'0.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Your backpack your choice
customer_reviews.text: LUV it! Spilled some wax on it! But it still works to hold my items! Also it has a whistle!
customer_reviews.author: Nova5ever

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is even better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is even better than I expected. The color is a darker purple than my screen shows, which I prefer. It has great padding (inside & out) & is very sturdy & clearly well built. It has several great pockets and sleeves which are fleece-lined. I would definitely recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite backpack! Nice padded interior and it has lots ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite backpack! Nice padded interior and it has lots of space for my business items. Definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Cute and lost of space
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my 12 year old. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Todd

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: I loved the book bag just that the side where you put the laptop in is heavy and it won’t sit-up straight
customer_reviews.author: suliquey s.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable straps
customer_reviews.text: This pack had all the right pockets for organizing small things, but the straps were oddly placed for my build and very very stiff and thin.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa K

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Though today was her first day back at school from the break, she organized it and got it ready last night and she loved it. I hope is durable and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Mascorro

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too small
customer_reviews.text: Good construction, but not as big as I would like. Feels tight trying to get all of my books and supplies in
customer_reviews.author: Jeanderson

customer_reviews.title: bought two of these for high school girls to use ...
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these for high school girls to use and the really do make a difference from standard back packs. Less back and shoulder pain and they are very well made and seem to hold quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack and love the color!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this back pack! It’s just what I was looking for. I was unsure of the color but was pleasantly surprised. If you love turquoise you’ll love the Kokomo Green / Everglade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: The North Face Women's Recon TNF Black One Size
feature_bullets: RECON CLASSIC. Our iconic 30L backpack is updated with a stretch front stash pocket and improved organization. A spacious main compartment with a padded fleece-lined 15" laptop sleeve protects your computer.

FLEX VENT TECHNOLOGY. The FlexVent suspension system features a flexible yoke built from custom injection-molded shoulder straps, a padded mesh back panel and a breathable lumbar panel for comfortable, ventilated support.

TOTAL ORGANIZATION. Two extended mesh water bottle pockets double as multi-use pockets. The front compartment has an extra padded tablet sleeve and zip pockets. An external fleece-lined pocket stores small items or electronics.

COMFORTABLE CARRY. For school, commuting or travel, this backpack has a top handle for easy grabbing and a removable waist belt for a custom fit. A sternum strap with whistle buckle adds extra support and safety. Reflective details help you stand out.
TECHNICAL SPECS. Dimensions: 19.25" X 13" X 7" (48.9 cm X 33 cm X 17.8 cm). Volume: 30 Liters.
